statements: UPDATE BiometricData SET biometric_type = 'fingerprint' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE BiometricData SET access_time = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE BiometricData SET biometric_data = '\x01FFA2', access_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE BiometricData SET username = 'johndoe', biometric_type = 'fingerprint', biometric_data = '\x1234ABCD', access_time = current_timestamp WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_data = 'new_data' WHERE user_id = 123 AND biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'running', timestamp = '2023-09-12 10:15:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND activity_type = 'jogging';
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_data = 'updated_data1' WHERE user_id = 1 AND biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'running' WHERE user_id = 2 AND timestamp = '2022-02-04 08:30:00';
UPDATE user_activity SET biometric_data = NULL WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_data = '{"type": "new_pattern"}' WHERE pattern_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity SET username = 'John Doe', login_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_data = '{"actions": ["login", "view", "logout"]}' WHERE pattern_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET username = 'johndoe123' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3';
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_details = '{"pattern":"new pattern"}' WHERE user_id = 'x1y2z3';
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 'a46de273-4fc0-4aab-b89d-10412981829c';
UPDATE access_logs SET access_type = 'denied', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 'a46de273-4fc0-4aab-b89d-10412981829c';
UPDATE users SET biometric_data = '{"fingerprint": true}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_data = '{"pattern": "Type A"}' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET biometric_data = '{"fingerprint": "AAAABBBBCCCCDDDD"}' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_data = '{"type": "typing_speed", "data": {"average_speed": 70, "sessions": ["session_id_1", "session_id_2"]}}' WHERE user_id = 456;
